name: A Quick Shmup
description:
A Quick Shmup I created on Christmas eve with my son.  It was pretty fun.  Few different random weapon power ups and which also affect speed. Gets pretty hectic after about a min.  I put the Game inside an NFT.  Whoever ends up owning it will have a game anyone browsing their wallet can play straight from desktop by clicking.  Cool??  Thanks for the support. Peace.  Hmu if you want to support and buy the NFT.  Its my sons art.

Song 'Rocket' by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) \n Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License \n http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
